description: Main entry point for a Flutter application implementing a 2048 puzzle game with custom UI, dialogs, and state management using provider.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, sets up provider and theme.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget managing game outcome dialogs and restart flow.

classes.name: _RootScaffoldState
classes.description: State class for _RootScaffold, contains the dialog logic and UI interactions.

classes.name: _RootColumn
classes.description: Stateless widget organizing main UI components including score, board, and controls.

classes.name: _ControlBarContainer
classes.description: Widget providing undo and restart buttons with provider interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class, constructing their UI.

methods.name: _maybeShowOutcomeDialog
methods.description: Checks game state and shows win or game over dialogs accordingly.

methods.name: _showWinDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog when the player wins the game.

methods.name: _showGameOverDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog when the game is over without a win.

methods.name: _confirmAndRestart
methods.description: Prompts user for restart confirmation, then resets the game if confirmed.
